price: и реч нашег Господара да ћемо, заиста, да искусимо казну - на нама се остварила,
arabic: فَحَقَّ عَلَيۡنَا قَوۡلُ رَبِّنَآۖ إِنَّا لَذَآئِقُونَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: faḥaqqa ʿalaynā qawlu rabbinā innā ladhāiqūna
